According to the JUnit faq the solution to this problem is to "use
excluded.properties ...or turn off reloading".

Turning off reloading works but isn't the best solution. I've tried
unsuccessfully to exclude various packages but so far no joy. Any ideas
which packages have to be excluded for this to work? We're running WLS
6.0sp1.

Steven Hale, wm-data
subject: ClassCastException while calling EJB's from JUnit
